title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Holubivka, Dvorichna, Synkivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airst...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Holubivka, Dvorichna, Synkivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Kyslivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
